name: Blade Storm
tooltip: Unleashes a volley of cursed swords, dealing 43x3 Pierce damage in a small area around the target. Ability damage. Also reduces damage of units hit by the swords by 1 for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Ability damage.
